Class ConnectServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • ConnectServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class ConnectServer
extends processing.core.PApplet
    The main class for the ConnectIO Server. It acts as the overall controller of the game.
    Author:
    Kevin Li

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts a PApplet application, and tells it to use this class, ConnectServer, as the program to run. This is done by calling PApplet's main method and giving it the name of this class as a parameter. The class constructor is called first, then settings(), setup(), and the draw() function are called in that respective order. https://processing.org/tutorials/eclipse/
        Parameters:
        args -
